title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation
text: O'Neil S (2026). immutables: Fast Functional Data Structures. R package version 0.0.1, https://github.com/oneilsh/immutables.
code: @Manual{,   title = {immutables: Fast and Functional Data Structures},   author = {Shawn T. O'Neil},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 0.0.1},   url = {https://github.com/oneilsh/immutables}, }

title: fingertree
text: Alpha tests monoid-annotated fingertrees R. Please note repository much alpha work--progress; code inefficient, functionality missing.

title: fingertree
text: Two options useful benchmarking/debugging internals: Enables/disables C++ fast paths append/prepend/indexing/split/locate/concat. Default TRUE. Enables extra monoid normalization checks inside hot-path monoid resolution. Useful debugging hand-mutated trees. Default FALSE (fast path). R/ - implementation files 2-3 finger tree monoids. scripts/monoids_demo.R - demo/exploration monoid-annotated binary trees (2-3 finger trees). scripts/monoids_typed.R - typed monoid/tree implementation using lambda.r. scripts/ - demo/experiment scripts finger trees plotting.

title: Construct a MeasureMonoid — MeasureMonoid
Construct a MeasureMonoid — MeasureMonoid
code: MeasureMonoid(f, i, measure)

title: Construct a MeasureMonoid — MeasureMonoid
text: f Associative binary function measure values. Identity measure value `f`. measure Function mapping raw element measure value.

title: Construct a MeasureMonoid — MeasureMonoid
Construct a MeasureMonoid — MeasureMonoid
code: sum_m <- MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric) t <- tree_from(1:5) reduce_left(t, sum_m) #> [1] 15  # Measure from element metadata t2 <- tree_from(letters[1:3], values = c(10, 20, 30)) value_sum <- MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, function(el) as.numeric(attr(el, "value"))) reduce_right(t2, value_sum) #> Error in r$f(t, acc): non-numeric argument to binary operator

code: predicate(f)

title: Construct a Predicate Function — predicate
text: f Predicate function accumulated measure values.

title: Construct a Predicate Function — predicate
Construct a Predicate Function — predicate
code: p <- predicate(function(v) v >= 3) p(2) #> [1] FALSE p(3) #> [1] TRUE  t <- as_flexseq(letters[1:5]) locate(t, p, ".size") #> $found #> [1] TRUE #>  #> $elem #> [1] "c" #>

title: Add/merge monoids on an existing tree — add_monoids
text: t FingerTree. monoids Named list `MeasureMonoid` objects add. overwrite Logical; whether overlapping names replace existing monoids.

title: Add/merge monoids on an existing tree — add_monoids
Add/merge monoids on an existing tree — add_monoids
code: t <- tree_from(1:5) #> Error in tree_from(1:5): could not find function "tree_from" sum_m <- MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric) #> Error in MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric): could not find function "MeasureMonoid" t2 <- add_monoids(t, list(sum = sum_m)) #> Error: object 'sum_m' not found attr(t2, "measures")$sum #> Error: object 't2' not found  # Replace an existing monoid definition sum2 <- MeasureMonoid(function(a, b) a + 2 * b, 0, as.numeric) #> Error in MeasureMonoid(function(a, b) a + 2 * b, 0, as.numeric): could not find function "MeasureMonoid" t3 <- add_monoids(t2, list(sum = sum2), overwrite = TRUE) #> Error: object 'sum2' not found attr(t3, "measures")$sum #> Error: object 't3' not found

title: Append an element — append
Append an element — append
code: append(t, x)

title: Append an element — append
Append an element — append
text: Updated tree.   `t` name-indexed, appending unnamed elements invalid.

title: Append an element — append
code: t <- as_flexseq(letters[1:3]) t2 <- append(t, "d") t2[[4]] #> [1] "d"  # Compose with prepend and reduce cat_m <- measure_monoid(paste0, "", as.character) fold_right(prepend(t2, "z"), cat_m) #> [1] "zabcd"  # Append to a named tree with an explicit element name tn <- as_flexseq(setNames(as.list(1:2), c("a", "b"))) tn2 <- append(tn, stats::setNames(3, "c")) tn2[["c"]] #> c  #> 3

title: Concatenate Two Structural Trees — concat_trees
text: -name monoids assumed equivalent; left-tree definitions win. Missing monoids added side concatenation.

title: Concatenate Two Structural Trees — concat_trees
code: concat_trees(x, y)

title: Concatenate Two Structural Trees — concat_trees
text: x Left tree. y Right tree.

title: Concatenate Two Structural Trees — concat_trees
Concatenate Two Structural Trees — concat_trees
code: left <- tree_from(letters[1:3]) #> Error in tree_from(letters[1:3]): could not find function "tree_from" right <- tree_from(letters[4:6]) #> Error in tree_from(letters[4:6]): could not find function "tree_from" t <- concat_trees(left, right) #> Error in concat_trees(left, right): could not find function "concat_trees" cat_m <- MeasureMonoid(paste0, "", as.character) #> Error in MeasureMonoid(paste0, "", as.character): could not find function "MeasureMonoid" fold_left(t, cat_m) #> Error in UseMethod("fold_left"): no applicable method for 'fold_left' applied to an object of class "function"  # Concatenate trees carrying a custom monoid sum_m <- MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric) #> Error in MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric): could not find function "MeasureMonoid" a <- tree_from(1:3, monoids = list(sum = sum_m)) #> Error in tree_from(1:3, monoids = list(sum = sum_m)): could not find function "tree_from" b <- tree_from(4:5, monoids = list(sum = sum_m)) #> Error in tree_from(4:5, monoids = list(sum = sum_m)): could not find function "tree_from" t2 <- suppressWarnings(concat_trees(a, b)) #> Error in concat_trees(a, b): could not find function "concat_trees" attr(t2, "measures")$sum #> Error: object 't2' not found

what: Locate first predicate flip without reconstructing context trees — locate
title: Locate first predicate flip without reconstructing context trees — locate
text: Read-analogue `split_tree()`: finds distinguished element scan predicate flips, rebuild left/right trees.

title: Locate first predicate flip without reconstructing context trees — locate
code: locate(t, predicate, monoid_name, accumulator = NULL, include_metadata = FALSE)

title: Locate first predicate flip without reconstructing context trees — locate
text: t FingerTree. predicate Function accumulated measure values. monoid_name Name monoid `attr(t, "monoids")`. accumulator Optional starting measure (defaults monoid identity). include_metadata Logical; include left/hit/right measures index.

title: Locate first predicate flip without reconstructing context trees — locate
text: `include_metadata = FALSE`: `list(found, elem)`.   `TRUE`: `list(found, elem, metadata = list(left_measure, hit_measure,   right_measure, index))`.

title: Locate first predicate flip without reconstructing context trees — locate
code: t <- tree_from(letters[1:6]) #> Error in tree_from(letters[1:6]): could not find function "tree_from" locate(t, function(v) v >= 4, ".size") #> Error in (structure(function (t, required) {    ms <- attr(t, "monoids", exact = TRUE)    if (required && is.null(ms)) {        stop("Tree has no monoids attribute.")    }    if (is.null(ms)) {        return(NULL)    }    if (isTRUE(getOption("immutables.validate_monoids", FALSE))) {        return(ensure_size_monoids(ms))    }    ms}, topenv = "<environment: namespace:immutables> ", name = "resolve_tree_monoids"))(t = function (x) UseMethod("t"), required = TRUE): Tree has no monoids attribute.  # Metadata-rich locate for custom monoid sum_m <- MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric) #> Error in MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric): could not find function "MeasureMonoid" t2 <- tree_from(1:6, monoids = list(sum = sum_m)) #> Error in tree_from(1:6, monoids = list(sum = sum_m)): could not find function "tree_from" locate(t2, function(v) v >= 10, "sum", include_metadata = TRUE) #> Error: object 't2' not found

title: Construct a Measure Monoid Specification — measure_monoid
Construct a Measure Monoid Specification — measure_monoid
code: sum_m <- measure_monoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric) t <- as_flexseq(1:5) fold_left(t, sum_m) #> [1] 15  # Add a custom monoid after construction nchar_sum <- measure_monoid(`+`, 0, function(el) nchar(as.character(el))) t2 <- add_monoids(as_flexseq(letters[1:3]), list(nchar_sum = nchar_sum)) attr(t2, "measures")$nchar_sum #> [1] 3

title: Prepend an element — prepend

text: Updated tree.   `t` name-indexed, prepending unnamed elements invalid.

title: Prepend an element — prepend
code: t <- as_flexseq(letters[2:4]) t2 <- prepend(t, "a") t2[[1]] #> [1] "a"  # Compose with append and reduce cat_m <- measure_monoid(paste0, "", as.character) fold_left(append(t2, "z"), cat_m) #> [1] "abcdz"  # Prepend to a named tree with an explicit element name tn <- as_flexseq(setNames(as.list(2:3), c("b", "c"))) tn2 <- prepend(tn, stats::setNames(1, "a")) tn2[["a"]] #> a  #> 1

title: Print a compact summary of a finger tree — print.FingerTree

code: t <- as_flexseq(letters[1:10]) t #> FingerTree <size=10, named=no> #>   monoids: none #>  #> [[1]] #> [1] "a" #>  #> [[2]] #> [1] "b" #>  #> [[3]] #> [1] "c" #>  #> [[4]] #> [1] "d" #>  #> [[5]] #> [1] "e" #>  #> [[6]] #> [1] "f" #>  #> ... and 4 more elements not shown  tn <- as_flexseq(setNames(as.list(1:5), paste0("k", 1:5))) tn #> FingerTree <size=5, named=yes> #>   monoids: none #>  #> $k1 #> [1] 1 #>  #> $k2 #> [1] 2 #>  #> $k3 #> [1] 3 #>  #> $k4 #> [1] 4 #>  #> $k5 #> [1] 5 #>
